properties.name: BR/01
properties.notes: The Bishop’s Stortford High School site has been allocated in the emerging East Herts District Plan, under Policy BISH6. This site will only be released for development if sufficient secondary school capacity is provided within the Bishop’s Stortford South site (BISH5), also allocated in the East Herts District Plan. Only part of the whole site is brownfield.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
